title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session
name: Info Session
description: Info button, with session persistent open/closed status
author: Mario Pietsch
text: { "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/history": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/history", "text": "V 0.1.4 - 2020-12-25 * update license V 0.1.3 - 2020.01.19 * Update license link/text V 0.1.2 - 2016 * initial release " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/license", "text": "[[Info-Session-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#info-session]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2021 https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause " }, "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/readme", "text": "* This plugin provides a tiddler info button, with a persistent open/close status ''for one browser session''. * The status is saved in a system "$:/state/popup" variable. ** This means, if you reload the TW, the status is gone, sice they are not stored by default! ''Important:'' * This plugin changes the core tiddler: $:/core/ui/Buttons/info ---- If you want persistent state variables, you need to ''add'' the "persistent-states" plugin ''and'' modify the ~ViewTemplate. The ''slant-01 theme" provides this functionality. " }, "$:/core/ui/Buttons/info": { "title": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/info", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/info-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}}", "text": "\whitespace trim <$reveal type="match" text="" default="" state=<> > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="visible"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/info-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/info-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}/> " } } }
